answerText: the Ganges [accept Ganga][10] The Ganges is one of the four rivers visited in this pilgrimage which takes place every three years. In this pilgrimage, millions of people gather to bathe in a sacred river.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 3 | 4 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The descent of this river to Earth is celebrated as the avatarana. For 10 points each: [10] Name this river, which is considered the holiest in Hinduism.
